name: College Hub
fetchers: This is a full-stack website for university applications.
This website was created using the MERN stack.
On this website, users can explore some of the world's most popular universities and apply after logging in or signing up.
After logging in, users can view their profile picture and username.
Clicking on the username user will got to user profile page.
User can view user information and change user information from profile page.
Before login/register in, users can view all page route in navbar but user only visit the homepage and the colleges page. And After login/register user can visit all page of our website.
Users can apply to only one university from the admission page.
Once a user applies to one university, this user cannot apply to any other university.
A user can view the university he has applied to from the My-College page and view the details of that university as well as his application form.
